record.author: Crowley, T. (2006). The Avava language ...
record.notes:
from: Crowley, T. (2006). The Avava language of Central Malakula (Vanuatu). Edited by John Lynch. Pacific Linguistics, Research School of Pacific and Asian Studies, The Australian National University, Canberra.
/bb/ = voiced bilabial trill, /ng/ = velar nasal
Also know as Katbol
